H0.text: Which volcano in Tanzania is the highest mountain in Africa. Kilimanjaro

H1.text: Which volcano in Tanzania is the highest mountain in Africa. Meru

H2.text: Which volcano in Tanzania is the highest mountain in Africa. Usambara

H3.text: Which volcano in Tanzania is the highest mountain in Africa. Mawensi

A4.text: It is the highest mountain in Africa and the highest free-standing mountain above sea level in the world, at 5,895 m (19,341 ft) above sea level and 4,900 m (16,100 ft) above its plateau base.
